item.description:
Stanley Cup Championship
Boston Bruins vs. Chicago Blackhawks
Game 1: June 12th, 8 pm

Simple and straight-forward. Come loud, come proud, and represent the Bruins as they take on the Blackhawks for Lord Stanley's Cup! Wear your Bruins gear!

LOCATION: Ladder 133 with 32 HD TV's, both inside and outside! It's a Wednesday night, so Ladder 133 has Wild Wing Wednesday's where just a pound of their wings is just $3.50. There will also be other food and drink specials in light of the Stanley Cup Game.

RSVP ASAP, we can put in table reservations tomorrow morning if anyone would like!

I'll put in details about how to find me. Right now, I'll be sporting a blue/gray rugby shirt with a '20' in orange on the back.
item.name: Bruins @ Blackhawks - Stanley Cup Game 1
